                              <div class="line">Had left the flushing in her galled eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">She married. O, most wicked speed, to post</div>
                              <div class="line">With such dexterity to incestuous sheets!</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not nor it cannot come to good:</div>
                              <div class="line">But break, my heart; for I must hold my tongue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HORATIO, MARCELLUS, and BERNARDO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail to your lordship!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see you well:</div>
                              <div class="line">Horatio,--or I do forget myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The same, my lord, and your poor servant ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, my good friend; I'll change that name with you:</div>
                              <div class="line">And what make you from Wittenberg, Horatio? Marcellus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">My good lord--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I am very glad to see you. Good even, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">But what, in faith, make you from Wittenberg?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A truant disposition, good my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not hear your enemy say so,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor shall you do mine ear that violence,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make it truster of your own report</div>
                              <div class="line">Against yourself: I know you are no truant.</div>
                              <div class="line">But what is your affair in Elsinore?</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll teach you to drink deep ere you depart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I came to see your father's funeral.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, do not mock me, fellow-student;</div>
                              <div class="line">I think it was to see my mother's wedding.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, my lord, it follow'd hard upon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Thrift, thrift, Horatio! the funeral baked meats</div>
                              <div class="line">Did coldly furnish forth the marriage tables.</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I had met my dearest foe in heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">Or ever I had seen that day, Horatio!</div>
                              <div class="line">My father!--methinks I see my father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">In my mind's eye, Horatio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw him once; he was a goodly king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">He was a man, take him for all in all,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall not look upon his like again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I think I saw him yesternight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Saw? who?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, the king your father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">The king my father!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Season your admiration for awhile</div>
                              <div class="line">With an attent ear, till I may deliver,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the witness of these gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">This marvel to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">For God's love, let me hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Two nights together had these gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">Marcellus and Bernardo, on their watch,</div>
                              <div class="line">In the dead vast and middle of the night,</div>
                              <div class="line">Been thus encounter'd. A figure like your father,</div>
                              <div class="line">Armed at point exactly, cap-a-pe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Appears before them, and with solemn march</div>
                              <div class="line">Goes slow and stately by them: thrice he walk'd</div>
                              <div class="line">By their oppress'd and fear-surprised eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Within his truncheon's length; whilst they, distilled</div>
                              <div class="line">Almost to jelly with the act of fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand dumb and speak not to him. This to me</div>
                              <div class="line">In dreadful secrecy impart they did;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I with them the third night kept the watch;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, as they had deliver'd, both in time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Form of the thing, each word made true and good,</div>
                              <div class="line">The apparition comes: I knew your father;</div>
                              <div class="line">These hands are not more like.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">But where was this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, upon the platform where we watch'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you not speak to it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I did;</div>
                              <div class="line">But answer made it none: yet once methought</div>
                              <div class="line">It lifted up its head and did address</div>
                              <div class="line">Itself to motion, like as it would speak;</div>
                              <div class="line">But even then the morning cock crew loud,</div>
                              <div class="line">And at the sound it shrunk in haste away,</div>
                              <div class="line">And vanish'd from our sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis very strange.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">As I do live, my honour'd lord, 'tis true;</div>
                              <div class="line">And we did think it writ down in our duty</div>
                              <div class="line">To let you know of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, indeed, sirs, but this troubles me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold you the watch to-night?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="speaker">BERNARDO</div>
                              <div class="line">We do, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Arm'd, say you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="speaker">BERNARDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Arm'd, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">From top to toe?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="speaker">BERNARDO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, from head to foot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Then saw you not his face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, yes, my lord; he wore his beaver up.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">What, look'd he frowningly?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A countenance more in sorrow than in anger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Pale or red?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, very pale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">And fix'd his eyes upon you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Most constantly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I would I had been there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It would have much amazed you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Very like, very like. Stay'd it long?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">While one with moderate haste might tell a hundred.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="speaker">BERNARDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Longer, longer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not when I saw't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">His beard was grizzled--no?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It was, as I have seen it in his life,</div>
                              <div class="line">A sable silver'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I will watch to-night;</div>
                              <div class="line">Perchance 'twill walk again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant it will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">If it assume my noble father's person,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll speak to it, though hell itself should gape</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid me hold my peace. I pray you all,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you have hitherto conceal'd this sight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it be tenable in your silence still;</div>
                              <div class="line">And whatsoever else shall hap to-night,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give it an understanding, but no tongue:</div>
                              <div class="line">I will requite your loves. So, fare you well:</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the platform, 'twixt eleven and twelve,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll visit you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All</div>
                              <div class="line">Our duty to your honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Your loves, as mine to you: farewell.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt all but HAMLET</p>
                              <div class="line">My father's spirit in arms! all is not well;</div>
                              <div class="line">I doubt some foul play: would the night were come!</div>
                              <div class="line">Till then sit still, my soul: foul deeds will rise,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though all the earth o'erwhelm them, to men's eyes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A room in Polonius' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LAERTES and OPHELIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAERTES</div>
                              <div class="line">My necessaries are embark'd: farewell:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, sister, as the winds give benefit</div>
                              <div class="line">And convoy is assistant, do not sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">But let me hear from you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you doubt that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAERTES</div>
                              <div class="line">For Hamlet and the trifling of his favour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold it a fashion and a toy in blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">A violet in the youth of primy nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Forward, not permanent, sweet, not lasting,</div>
                              <div class="line">The perfume and suppliance of a minute; No more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No more but so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAERTES</div>
                              <div class="line">Think it no more;</div>
                              <div class="line">For nature, crescent, does not grow alone</div>
                              <div class="line">In thews and bulk, but, as this temple waxes,</div>
                              <div class="line">The inward service of the mind and soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Grows wide withal. Perhaps he loves you now,</div>
                              <div class="line">And now no soil nor cautel doth besmirch</div>
                              <div class="line">The virtue of his will: but you must fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">His greatness weigh'd, his will is not his own;</div>
                              <div class="line">For he himself is subject to his birth:</div>
                              <div class="line">He may not, as unvalued persons do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Carve for himself; for on his choice depends</div>
                              <div class="line">The safety and health of this whole state;</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore must his choice be circumscribed</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto the voice and yielding of that body</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereof he is the head. Then if he says he loves you,</div>
                              <div class="line">It fits your wisdom so far to believe it</div>
                              <div class="line">As he in his particular act and place</div>
                              <div class="line">May give his saying deed; which is no further</div>
                              <div class="line">Than the main voice of Denmark goes withal.</div>
                              <div class="line">Then weigh what loss your honour may sustain,</div>
                              <div class="line">If with too credent ear you list his songs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or lose your heart, or your chaste treasure open</div>
                              <div class="line">To his unmaster'd importunity.</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear it, Ophelia, fear it, my dear sister,</div>
                              <div class="line">And keep you in the rear of your affection,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of the shot and danger of desire.</div>
                              <div class="line">The chariest maid is prodigal enough,</div>
                              <div class="line">If she unmask her beauty to the moon:</div>
                              <div class="line">Virtue itself 'scapes not calumnious strokes:</div>
                              <div class="line">The canker galls the infants of the spring,</div>
                              <div class="line">Too oft before their buttons be disclosed,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the morn and liquid dew of youth</div>
                              <div class="line">Contagious blastments are most imminent.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be wary then; best safety lies in fear:</div>
                              <div class="line">Youth to itself rebels, though none else near.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall the effect of this good lesson keep,</div>
                              <div class="line">As watchman to my heart. But, good my brother,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not, as some ungracious pastors do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Show me the steep and thorny way to heaven;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles, like a puff'd and reckless libertine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Himself the primrose path of dalliance treads,</div>
                              <div class="line">And recks not his own rede.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAERTES</div>
                              <div class="line">O, fear me not.</div>
                              <div class="line">I stay too long: but here my father comes.</div>
                              <p>Enter POLONIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">A double blessing is a double grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Occasion smiles upon a second leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet here, Laertes! aboard, aboard, for shame!</div>
                              <div class="line">The wind sits in the shoulder of your sail,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you are stay'd for. There; my blessing with thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">And these few precepts in thy memory</div>
                              <div class="line">See thou character. Give thy thoughts no tongue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor any unproportioned thought his act.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be thou familiar, but by no means vulgar.</div>
                              <div class="line">Those friends thou hast, and their adoption tried,</div>
                              <div class="line">Grapple them to thy soul with hoops of steel;</div>
                              <div class="line">But do not dull thy palm with entertainment</div>
                              <div class="line">Of each new-hatch'd, unfledged comrade. Beware</div>
                              <div class="line">Of entrance to a quarrel, but being in,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear't that the opposed may beware of thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give every man thy ear, but few thy voice;</div>
                              <div class="line">Take each man's censure, but reserve thy judgment.</div>
                              <div class="line">Costly thy habit as thy purse can buy,</div>
                              <div class="line">But not express'd in fancy; rich, not gaudy;</div>
                              <div class="line">For the apparel oft proclaims the man,</div>
                              <div class="line">And they in France of the best rank and station</div>
                              <div class="line">Are of a most select and generous chief in that.</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither a borrower nor a lender be;</div>
                              <div class="line">For loan oft loses both itself and friend,</div>
                              <div class="line">And borrowing dulls the edge of husbandry.</div>
                              <div class="line">This above all: to thine ownself be true,</div>
                              <div class="line">And it must follow, as the night the day,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou canst not then be false to any man.</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell: my blessing season this in thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAERTES</div>
                              <div class="line">Most humbly do I take my leave, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The time invites you; go; your servants tend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAERTES</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, Ophelia; and remember well</div>
                              <div class="line">What I have said to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis in my memory lock'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you yourself shall keep the key of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAERTES</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't, Ophelia, be hath said to you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">So please you, something touching the Lord Hamlet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, well bethought:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis told me, he hath very oft of late</div>
                              <div class="line">Given private time to you; and you yourself</div>
                              <div class="line">Have of your audience been most free and bounteous:</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be so, as so 'tis put on me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that in way of caution, I must tell you,</div>
                              <div class="line">You do not understand yourself so clearly</div>
                              <div class="line">As it behoves my daughter and your honour.</div>
                              <div class="line">What is between you? give me up the truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath, my lord, of late made many tenders</div>
                              <div class="line">Of his affection to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Affection! pooh! you speak like a green girl,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unsifted in such perilous circumstance.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you believe his tenders, as you call them?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not know, my lord, what I should think.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, I'll teach you: think yourself a baby;</div>
                              <div class="line">That you have ta'en these tenders for true pay,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which are not sterling. Tender yourself more dearly;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or--not to crack the wind of the poor phrase,</div>
                              <div class="line">Running it thus--you'll tender me a fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, he hath importuned me with love</div>
                              <div class="line">In honourable fashion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, fashion you may call it; go to, go to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">And hath given countenance to his speech, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">With almost all the holy vows of heaven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, springes to catch woodcocks. I do know,</div>
                              <div class="line">When the blood burns, how prodigal the soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Lends the tongue vows: these blazes, daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Giving more light than heat, extinct in both,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in their promise, as it is a-making,</div>
                              <div class="line">You must not take for fire. From this time</div>
                              <div class="line">Be somewhat scanter of your maiden presence;</div>
                              <div class="line">Set your entreatments at a higher rate</div>
                              <div class="line">Than a command to parley. For Lord Hamlet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe so much in him, that he is young</div>
                              <div class="line">And with a larger tether may he walk</div>
                              <div class="line">Than may be given you: in few, Ophelia,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not believe his vows; for they are brokers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not of that dye which their investments show,</div>
                              <div class="line">But mere implorators of unholy suits,</div>
                              <div class="line">Breathing like sanctified and pious bawds,</div>
                              <div class="line">The better to beguile. This is for all:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not, in plain terms, from this time forth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you so slander any moment leisure,</div>
                              <div class="line">As to give words or talk with the Lord Hamlet.</div>
                              <div class="line">Look to't, I charge you: come your ways.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall obey, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  The platform.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HAMLET, HORATIO, and MARCELLUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">The air bites shrewdly; it is very cold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a nipping and an eager air.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">What hour now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think it lacks of twelve.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">No, it is struck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed? I heard it not: then it draws near the season</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein the spirit held his wont to walk.</div>
                              <p>A flourish of trumpets, and ordnance shot off, within</p>
                              <div class="line">What does this mean, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">The king doth wake to-night and takes his rouse,</div>
                              <div class="line">Keeps wassail, and the swaggering up-spring reels;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, as he drains his draughts of Rhenish down,</div>
                              <div class="line">The kettle-drum and trumpet thus bray out</div>
                              <div class="line">The triumph of his pledge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it a custom?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, is't:</div>
                              <div class="line">But to my mind, though I am native here</div>
                              <div class="line">And to the manner born, it is a custom</div>
                              <div class="line">More honour'd in the breach than the observance.</div>
                              <div class="line">This heavy-headed revel east and west</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes us traduced and tax'd of other nations:</div>
                              <div class="line">They clepe us drunkards, and with swinish phrase</div>
                              <div class="line">Soil our addition; and indeed it takes</div>
                              <div class="line">From our achievements, though perform'd at height,</div>
                              <div class="line">The pith and marrow of our attribute.</div>
                              <div class="line">So, oft it chances in particular men,</div>
                              <div class="line">That for some vicious mole of nature in them,</div>
                              <div class="line">As, in their birth--wherein they are not guilty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since nature cannot choose his origin--</div>
                              <div class="line">By the o'ergrowth of some complexion,</div>
                              <div class="line">Oft breaking down the pales and forts of reason,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or by some habit that too much o'er-leavens</div>
                              <div class="line">The form of plausive manners, that these men,</div>
                              <div class="line">Carrying, I say, the stamp of one defect,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being nature's livery, or fortune's star,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Their virtues else--be they as pure as grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">As infinite as man may undergo--</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall in the general censure take corruption</div>
                              <div class="line">From that particular fault: the dram of eale</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth all the noble substance of a doubt</div>
                              <div class="line">To his own scandal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, my lord, it comes!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Ghost</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Angels and ministers of grace defend us!</div>
                              <div class="line">Be thou a spirit of health or goblin damn'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring with thee airs from heaven or blasts from hell,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be thy intents wicked or charitable,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou comest in such a questionable shape</div>
                              <div class="line">That I will speak to thee: I'll call thee Hamlet,</div>
                              <div class="line">King, father, royal Dane: O, answer me!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me not burst in ignorance; but tell</div>
                              <div class="line">Why thy canonized bones, hearsed in death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have burst their cerements; why the sepulchre,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein we saw thee quietly inurn'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath oped his ponderous and marble jaws,</div>
                              <div class="line">To cast thee up again. What may this mean,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou, dead corse, again in complete steel</div>
                              <div class="line">Revisit'st thus the glimpses of the moon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Making night hideous; and we fools of nature</div>
                              <div class="line">So horridly to shake our disposition</div>
                              <div class="line">With thoughts beyond the reaches of our souls?</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, why is this? wherefore? what should we do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Ghost beckons HAMLET</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It beckons you to go away with it,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if it some impartment did desire</div>
                              <div class="line">To you alone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, with what courteous action</div>
                              <div class="line">It waves you to a more removed ground:</div>
                              <div class="line">But do not go with it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, by no means.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">It will not speak; then I will follow it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what should be the fear?</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not set my life in a pin's fee;</div>
                              <div class="line">And for my soul, what can it do to that,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being a thing immortal as itself?</div>
                              <div class="line">It waves me forth again: I'll follow it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What if it tempt you toward the flood, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or to the dreadful summit of the cliff</div>
                              <div class="line">That beetles o'er his base into the sea,</div>
                              <div class="line">And there assume some other horrible form,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which might deprive your sovereignty of reason</div>
                              <div class="line">And draw you into madness? think of it:</div>
                              <div class="line">The very place puts toys of desperation,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without more motive, into every brain</div>
                              <div class="line">That looks so many fathoms to the sea</div>
                              <div class="line">And hears it roar beneath.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">It waves me still.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go on; I'll follow thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not go, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold off your hands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be ruled; you shall not go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">My fate cries out,</div>
                              <div class="line">And makes each petty artery in this body</div>
                              <div class="line">As hardy as the Nemean lion's nerve.</div>
                              <div class="line">Still am I call'd. Unhand me, gentlemen.</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, I'll make a ghost of him that lets me!</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, away! Go on; I'll follow thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Ghost and HAMLET</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He waxes desperate with imagination.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's follow; 'tis not fit thus to obey him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Have after. To what issue will this come?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Something is rotten in the state of Denmark.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven will direct it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, let's follow him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Another part of the platform.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter GHOST and HAMLET</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Where wilt thou lead me? speak; I'll go no further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">My hour is almost come,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I to sulphurous and tormenting flames</div>
                              <div class="line">Must render up myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, poor ghost!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">Pity me not, but lend thy serious hearing</div>
                              <div class="line">To what I shall unfold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak; I am bound to hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">So art thou to revenge, when thou shalt hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">What?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">I am thy father's spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Doom'd for a certain term to walk the night,</div>
                              <div class="line">And for the day confined to fast in fires,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till the foul crimes done in my days of nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Are burnt and purged away. But that I am forbid</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell the secrets of my prison-house,</div>
                              <div class="line">I could a tale unfold whose lightest word</div>
                              <div class="line">Would harrow up thy soul, freeze thy young blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make thy two eyes, like stars, start from their spheres,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy knotted and combined locks to part</div>
                              <div class="line">And each particular hair to stand on end,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like quills upon the fretful porpentine:</div>
                              <div class="line">But this eternal blazon must not be</div>
                              <div class="line">To ears of flesh and blood. List, list, O, list!</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou didst ever thy dear father love--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">O God!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">Revenge his foul and most unnatural murder.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Murder!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">Murder most foul, as in the best it is;</div>
                              <div class="line">But this most foul, strange and unnatural.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Haste me to know't, that I, with wings as swift</div>
                              <div class="line">As meditation or the thoughts of love,</div>
                              <div class="line">May sweep to my revenge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">I find thee apt;</div>
                              <div class="line">And duller shouldst thou be than the fat weed</div>
                              <div class="line">That roots itself in ease on Lethe wharf,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wouldst thou not stir in this. Now, Hamlet, hear:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis given out that, sleeping in my orchard,</div>
                              <div class="line">A serpent stung me; so the whole ear of Denmark</div>
                              <div class="line">Is by a forged process of my death</div>
                              <div class="line">Rankly abused: but know, thou noble youth,</div>
                              <div class="line">The serpent that did sting thy father's life</div>
                              <div class="line">Now wears his crown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">O my prophetic soul! My uncle!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that incestuous, that adulterate beast,</div>
                              <div class="line">With witchcraft of his wit, with traitorous gifts,--</div>
                              <div class="line">O wicked wit and gifts, that have the power</div>
                              <div class="line">So to seduce!--won to his shameful lust</div>
                              <div class="line">The will of my most seeming-virtuous queen:</div>
                              <div class="line">O Hamlet, what a falling-off was there!</div>
                              <div class="line">From me, whose love was of that dignity</div>
                              <div class="line">That it went hand in hand even with the vow</div>
                              <div class="line">I made to her in marriage, and to decline</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon a wretch whose natural gifts were poor</div>
                              <div class="line">To those of mine!</div>
                              <div class="line">But virtue, as it never will be moved,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though lewdness court it in a shape of heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">So lust, though to a radiant angel link'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will sate itself in a celestial bed,</div>
                              <div class="line">And prey on garbage.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, soft! methinks I scent the morning air;</div>
                              <div class="line">Brief let me be. Sleeping within my orchard,</div>
                              <div class="line">My custom always of the afternoon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my secure hour thy uncle stole,</div>
                              <div class="line">With juice of cursed hebenon in a vial,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the porches of my ears did pour</div>
                              <div class="line">The leperous distilment; whose effect</div>
                              <div class="line">Holds such an enmity with blood of man</div>
                              <div class="line">That swift as quicksilver it courses through</div>
                              <div class="line">The natural gates and alleys of the body,</div>
                              <div class="line">And with a sudden vigour doth posset</div>
                              <div class="line">And curd, like eager droppings into milk,</div>
                              <div class="line">The thin and wholesome blood: so did it mine;</div>
                              <div class="line">And a most instant tetter bark'd about,</div>
                              <div class="line">Most lazar-like, with vile and loathsome crust,</div>
                              <div class="line">All my smooth body.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus was I, sleeping, by a brother's hand</div>
                              <div class="line">Of life, of crown, of queen, at once dispatch'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">Cut off even in the blossoms of my sin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unhousel'd, disappointed, unanel'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">No reckoning made, but sent to my account</div>
                              <div class="line">With all my imperfections on my head:</div>
                              <div class="line">O, horrible! O, horrible! most horrible!</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou hast nature in thee, bear it not;</div>
                              <div class="line">Let not the royal bed of Denmark be</div>
                              <div class="line">A couch for luxury and damned incest.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, howsoever thou pursuest this act,</div>
                              <div class="line">Taint not thy mind, nor let thy soul contrive</div>
                              <div class="line">Against thy mother aught: leave her to heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">And to those thorns that in her bosom lodge,</div>
                              <div class="line">To prick and sting her. Fare thee well at once!</div>
                              <div class="line">The glow-worm shows the matin to be near,</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'gins to pale his uneffectual fire:</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu, adieu! Hamlet, remember me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">O all you host of heaven! O earth! what else?</div>
                              <div class="line">And shall I couple hell? O, fie! Hold, hold, my heart;</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, my sinews, grow not instant old,</div>
                              <div class="line">But bear me stiffly up. Remember thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, thou poor ghost, while memory holds a seat</div>
                              <div class="line">In this distracted globe. Remember thee!</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, from the table of my memory</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll wipe away all trivial fond records,</div>
                              <div class="line">All saws of books, all forms, all pressures past,</div>
                              <div class="line">That youth and observation copied there;</div>
                              <div class="line">And thy commandment all alone shall live</div>
                              <div class="line">Within the book and volume of my brain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unmix'd with baser matter: yes, by heaven!</div>
                              <div class="line">O most pernicious woman!</div>
                              <div class="line">O villain, villain, smiling, damned villain!</div>
                              <div class="line">My tables,--meet it is I set it down,</div>
                              <div class="line">That one may smile, and smile, and be a villain;</div>
                              <div class="line">At least I'm sure it may be so in Denmark:</div>
                              <p>Writing</p>
                              <div class="line">So, uncle, there you are. Now to my word;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is 'Adieu, adieu! remember me.'</div>
                              <div class="line">I have sworn 't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  My lord, my lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span> Lord Hamlet,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span> Heaven secure him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">So be it!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Hillo, ho, ho, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Hillo, ho, ho, boy! come, bird, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HORATIO and MARCELLUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How is't, my noble lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What news, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">O, wonderful!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good my lord, tell it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">No; you'll reveal it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I, my lord, by heaven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
