                              <div class="line">How say you, then; would heart of man once think it?</div>
                              <div class="line">But you'll be secret?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, by heaven, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">There's ne'er a villain dwelling in all Denmark</div>
                              <div class="line">But he's an arrant knave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">There needs no ghost, my lord, come from the grave</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell us this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, right; you are i' the right;</div>
                              <div class="line">And so, without more circumstance at all,</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold it fit that we shake hands and part:</div>
                              <div class="line">You, as your business and desire shall point you;</div>
                              <div class="line">For every man has business and desire,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such as it is; and for mine own poor part,</div>
                              <div class="line">Look you, I'll go pray.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">These are but wild and whirling words, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">I'm sorry they offend you, heartily;</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, 'faith heartily.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no offence, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, by Saint Patrick, but there is, Horatio,</div>
                              <div class="line">And much offence too. Touching this vision here,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is an honest ghost, that let me tell you:</div>
                              <div class="line">For your desire to know what is between us,</div>
                              <div class="line">O'ermaster 't as you may. And now, good friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">As you are friends, scholars and soldiers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me one poor request.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't, my lord? we will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Never make known what you have seen to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, we will not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but swear't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, not I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I, my lord, in faith.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my sword.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARCELLUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We have sworn, my lord, already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, upon my sword, indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Beneath</span>  Swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, ha, boy! say'st thou so? art thou there,</div>
                              <div class="line">truepenny?</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on--you hear this fellow in the cellarage--</div>
                              <div class="line">Consent to swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Propose the oath, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Never to speak of this that you have seen,</div>
                              <div class="line">Swear by my sword.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Beneath</span>  Swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Hic et ubique? then we'll shift our ground.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">And lay your hands again upon my sword:</div>
                              <div class="line">Never to speak of this that you have heard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Swear by my sword.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Beneath</span>  Swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Well said, old mole! canst work i' the earth so fast?</div>
                              <div class="line">A worthy pioner! Once more remove, good friends.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORATIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O day and night, but this is wondrous strange!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore as a stranger give it welcome.</div>
                              <div class="line">There are more things in heaven and earth, Horatio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than are dreamt of in your philosophy. But come;</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, as before, never, so help you mercy,</div>
                              <div class="line">How strange or odd soe'er I bear myself,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I perchance hereafter shall think meet</div>
                              <div class="line">To put an antic disposition on,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you, at such times seeing me, never shall,</div>
                              <div class="line">With arms encumber'd thus, or this headshake,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or by pronouncing of some doubtful phrase,</div>
                              <div class="line">As 'Well, well, we know,' or 'We could, an if we would,'</div>
                              <div class="line">Or 'If we list to speak,' or 'There be, an if they might,'</div>
                              <div class="line">Or such ambiguous giving out, to note</div>
                              <div class="line">That you know aught of me: this not to do,</div>
                              <div class="line">So grace and mercy at your most need help you, Swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Ghost</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Beneath</span>  Swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Rest, rest, perturbed spirit!</div>
                              <p>They swear</p>
                              <div class="line">So, gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all my love I do commend me to you:</div>
                              <div class="line">And what so poor a man as Hamlet is</div>
                              <div class="line">May do, to express his love and friending to you,</div>
                              <div class="line">God willing, shall not lack. Let us go in together;</div>
                              <div class="line">And still your fingers on your lips, I pray.</div>
                              <div class="line">The time is out of joint: O cursed spite,</div>
                              <div class="line">That ever I was born to set it right!</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, come, let's go together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A room in POLONIUS' house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter POLONIUS and REYNALDO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Give him this money and these notes, Reynaldo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall do marvellous wisely, good Reynaldo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before you visit him, to make inquire</div>
                              <div class="line">Of his behavior.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I did intend it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, well said; very well said. Look you, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Inquire me first what Danskers are in Paris;</div>
                              <div class="line">And how, and who, what means, and where they keep,</div>
                              <div class="line">What company, at what expense; and finding</div>
                              <div class="line">By this encompassment and drift of question</div>
                              <div class="line">That they do know my son, come you more nearer</div>
                              <div class="line">Than your particular demands will touch it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Take you, as 'twere, some distant knowledge of him;</div>
                              <div class="line">As thus, 'I know his father and his friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in part him: ' do you mark this, Reynaldo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, very well, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'And in part him; but' you may say 'not well:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, if't be he I mean, he's very wild;</div>
                              <div class="line">Addicted so and so:' and there put on him</div>
                              <div class="line">What forgeries you please; marry, none so rank</div>
                              <div class="line">As may dishonour him; take heed of that;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, sir, such wanton, wild and usual slips</div>
                              <div class="line">As are companions noted and most known</div>
                              <div class="line">To youth and liberty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">As gaming, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, or drinking, fencing, swearing, quarrelling,</div>
                              <div class="line">Drabbing: you may go so far.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, that would dishonour him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, no; as you may season it in the charge</div>
                              <div class="line">You must not put another scandal on him,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he is open to incontinency;</div>
                              <div class="line">That's not my meaning: but breathe his faults so quaintly</div>
                              <div class="line">That they may seem the taints of liberty,</div>
                              <div class="line">The flash and outbreak of a fiery mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">A savageness in unreclaimed blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of general assault.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">But, my good lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore should you do this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would know that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, here's my drift;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I believe, it is a fetch of wit:</div>
                              <div class="line">You laying these slight sullies on my son,</div>
                              <div class="line">As 'twere a thing a little soil'd i' the working, Mark you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your party in converse, him you would sound,</div>
                              <div class="line">Having ever seen in the prenominate crimes</div>
                              <div class="line">The youth you breathe of guilty, be assured</div>
                              <div class="line">He closes with you in this consequence;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Good sir,' or so, or 'friend,' or 'gentleman,'</div>
                              <div class="line">According to the phrase or the addition</div>
                              <div class="line">Of man and country.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Very good, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And then, sir, does he this--he does--what was I</div>
                              <div class="line">about to say? By the mass, I was about to say</div>
                              <div class="line">something: where did I leave?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">At 'closes in the consequence,' at 'friend or so,'</div>
                              <div class="line">and 'gentleman.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">At 'closes in the consequence,' ay, marry;</div>
                              <div class="line">He closes thus: 'I know the gentleman;</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw him yesterday, or t' other day,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or then, or then; with such, or such; and, as you say,</div>
                              <div class="line">There was a' gaming; there o'ertook in's rouse;</div>
                              <div class="line">There falling out at tennis:' or perchance,</div>
                              <div class="line">'I saw him enter such a house of sale,'</div>
                              <div class="line">Videlicet, a brothel, or so forth.</div>
                              <div class="line">See you now;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your bait of falsehood takes this carp of truth:</div>
                              <div class="line">And thus do we of wisdom and of reach,</div>
                              <div class="line">With windlasses and with assays of bias,</div>
                              <div class="line">By indirections find directions out:</div>
                              <div class="line">So by my former lecture and advice,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall you my son. You have me, have you not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">God be wi' you; fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Observe his inclination in yourself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">And let him ply his music.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">REYNALDO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell!</div>
                              <p>Exit REYNALDO</p>
                              <p>Enter OPHELIA</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Ophelia! what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my lord, my lord, I have been so affrighted!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">With what, i' the name of God?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, as I was sewing in my closet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Hamlet, with his doublet all unbraced;</div>
                              <div class="line">No hat upon his head; his stockings foul'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ungarter'd, and down-gyved to his ancle;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pale as his shirt; his knees knocking each other;</div>
                              <div class="line">And with a look so piteous in purport</div>
                              <div class="line">As if he had been loosed out of hell</div>
                              <div class="line">To speak of horrors,--he comes before me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Mad for thy love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I do not know;</div>
                              <div class="line">But truly, I do fear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What said he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">He took me by the wrist and held me hard;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then goes he to the length of all his arm;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, with his other hand thus o'er his brow,</div>
                              <div class="line">He falls to such perusal of my face</div>
                              <div class="line">As he would draw it. Long stay'd he so;</div>
                              <div class="line">At last, a little shaking of mine arm</div>
                              <div class="line">And thrice his head thus waving up and down,</div>
                              <div class="line">He raised a sigh so piteous and profound</div>
                              <div class="line">As it did seem to shatter all his bulk</div>
                              <div class="line">And end his being: that done, he lets me go:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, with his head over his shoulder turn'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">He seem'd to find his way without his eyes;</div>
                              <div class="line">For out o' doors he went without their helps,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, to the last, bended their light on me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, go with me: I will go seek the king.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the very ecstasy of love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose violent property fordoes itself</div>
                              <div class="line">And leads the will to desperate undertakings</div>
                              <div class="line">As oft as any passion under heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">That does afflict our natures. I am sorry.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, have you given him any hard words of late?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OPHELIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my good lord, but, as you did command,</div>
                              <div class="line">I did repel his fetters and denied</div>
                              <div class="line">His access to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That hath made him mad.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry that with better heed and judgment</div>
                              <div class="line">I had not quoted him: I fear'd he did but trifle,</div>
                              <div class="line">And meant to wreck thee; but, beshrew my jealousy!</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, it is as proper to our age</div>
                              <div class="line">To cast beyond ourselves in our opinions</div>
                              <div class="line">As it is common for the younger sort</div>
                              <div class="line">To lack discretion. Come, go we to the king:</div>
                              <div class="line">This must be known; which, being kept close, might</div>
                              <div class="line">move</div>
                              <div class="line">More grief to hide than hate to utter love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KING CLAUDIUS, QUEEN GERTRUDE, ROSENCRANTZ,
GUILDENSTERN, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, dear Rosencrantz and Guildenstern!</div>
                              <div class="line">Moreover that we much did long to see you,</div>
                              <div class="line">The need we have to use you did provoke</div>
                              <div class="line">Our hasty sending. Something have you heard</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Hamlet's transformation; so call it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sith nor the exterior nor the inward man</div>
                              <div class="line">Resembles that it was. What it should be,</div>
                              <div class="line">More than his father's death, that thus hath put him</div>
                              <div class="line">So much from the understanding of himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot dream of: I entreat you both,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, being of so young days brought up with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And sith so neighbour'd to his youth and havior,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you vouchsafe your rest here in our court</div>
                              <div class="line">Some little time: so by your companies</div>
                              <div class="line">To draw him on to pleasures, and to gather,</div>
                              <div class="line">So much as from occasion you may glean,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether aught, to us unknown, afflicts him thus,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, open'd, lies within our remedy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">Good gentlemen, he hath much talk'd of you;</div>
                              <div class="line">And sure I am two men there are not living</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom he more adheres. If it will please you</div>
                              <div class="line">To show us so much gentry and good will</div>
                              <div class="line">As to expend your time with us awhile,</div>
                              <div class="line">For the supply and profit of our hope,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your visitation shall receive such thanks</div>
                              <div class="line">As fits a king's remembrance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSENCRANTZ</div>
                              <div class="line">Both your majesties</div>
                              <div class="line">Might, by the sovereign power you have of us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Put your dread pleasures more into command</div>
                              <div class="line">Than to entreaty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GUILDENSTERN</div>
                              <div class="line">But we both obey,</div>
                              <div class="line">And here give up ourselves, in the full bent</div>
                              <div class="line">To lay our service freely at your feet,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be commanded.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks, Rosencrantz and gentle Guildenstern.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks, Guildenstern and gentle Rosencrantz:</div>
                              <div class="line">And I beseech you instantly to visit</div>
                              <div class="line">My too much changed son. Go, some of you,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring these gentlemen where Hamlet is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GUILDENSTERN</div>
                              <div class="line">Heavens make our presence and our practises</div>
                              <div class="line">Pleasant and helpful to him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, amen!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt ROSENCRANTZ, GUILDENSTERN, and some
Attendants</p>
                        <p>Enter POLONIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">The ambassadors from Norway, my good lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are joyfully return'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou still hast been the father of good news.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I, my lord? I assure my good liege,</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold my duty, as I hold my soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Both to my God and to my gracious king:</div>
                              <div class="line">And I do think, or else this brain of mine</div>
                              <div class="line">Hunts not the trail of policy so sure</div>
                              <div class="line">As it hath used to do, that I have found</div>
                              <div class="line">The very cause of Hamlet's lunacy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">O, speak of that; that do I long to hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Give first admittance to the ambassadors;</div>
                              <div class="line">My news shall be the fruit to that great feast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thyself do grace to them, and bring them in.</div>
                              <p>Exit POLONIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">He tells me, my dear Gertrude, he hath found</div>
                              <div class="line">The head and source of all your son's distemper.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">I doubt it is no other but the main;</div>
                              <div class="line">His father's death, and our o'erhasty marriage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, we shall sift him.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter POLONIUS, with VOLTIMAND and CORNELIUS</p>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, my good friends!</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, Voltimand, what from our brother Norway?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">VOLTIMAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Most fair return of greetings and desires.</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon our first, he sent out to suppress</div>
                              <div class="line">His nephew's levies; which to him appear'd</div>
                              <div class="line">To be a preparation 'gainst the Polack;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, better look'd into, he truly found</div>
                              <div class="line">It was against your highness: whereat grieved,</div>
                              <div class="line">That so his sickness, age and impotence</div>
                              <div class="line">Was falsely borne in hand, sends out arrests</div>
                              <div class="line">On Fortinbras; which he, in brief, obeys;</div>
                              <div class="line">Receives rebuke from Norway, and in fine</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes vow before his uncle never more</div>
                              <div class="line">To give the assay of arms against your majesty.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereon old Norway, overcome with joy,</div>
                              <div class="line">Gives him three thousand crowns in annual fee,</div>
                              <div class="line">And his commission to employ those soldiers,</div>
                              <div class="line">So levied as before, against the Polack:</div>
                              <div class="line">With an entreaty, herein further shown,</div>
                              <p>Giving a paper</p>
                              <div class="line">That it might please you to give quiet pass</div>
                              <div class="line">Through your dominions for this enterprise,</div>
                              <div class="line">On such regards of safety and allowance</div>
                              <div class="line">As therein are set down.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It likes us well;</div>
                              <div class="line">And at our more consider'd time well read,</div>
                              <div class="line">Answer, and think upon this business.</div>
                              <div class="line">Meantime we thank you for your well-took labour:</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to your rest; at night we'll feast together:</div>
                              <div class="line">Most welcome home!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt VOLTIMAND and CORNELIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This business is well ended.</div>
                              <div class="line">My liege, and madam, to expostulate</div>
                              <div class="line">What majesty should be, what duty is,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why day is day, night night, and time is time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were nothing but to waste night, day and time.</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore, since brevity is the soul of wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">And tediousness the limbs and outward flourishes,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be brief: your noble son is mad:</div>
                              <div class="line">Mad call I it; for, to define true madness,</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't but to be nothing else but mad?</div>
                              <div class="line">But let that go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">More matter, with less art.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, I swear I use no art at all.</div>
                              <div class="line">That he is mad, 'tis true: 'tis true 'tis pity;</div>
                              <div class="line">And pity 'tis 'tis true: a foolish figure;</div>
                              <div class="line">But farewell it, for I will use no art.</div>
                              <div class="line">Mad let us grant him, then: and now remains</div>
                              <div class="line">That we find out the cause of this effect,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or rather say, the cause of this defect,</div>
                              <div class="line">For this effect defective comes by cause:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus it remains, and the remainder thus. Perpend.</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a daughter--have while she is mine--</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, in her duty and obedience, mark,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath given me this: now gather, and surmise.</div>
                              <p>Reads</p>
                              <div class="line">'To the celestial and my soul's idol, the most</div>
                              <div class="line">beautified Ophelia,'--</div>
                              <div class="line">That's an ill phrase, a vile phrase; 'beautified' is</div>
                              <div class="line">a vile phrase: but you shall hear. Thus:</div>
                              <p>Reads</p>
                              <div class="line">'In her excellent white bosom, these, &c.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">Came this from Hamlet to her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Good madam, stay awhile; I will be faithful.</div>
                              <p>Reads</p>
                              <div class="line">'Doubt thou the stars are fire;</div>
                              <div class="line">Doubt that the sun doth move;</div>
                              <div class="line">Doubt truth to be a liar;</div>
                              <div class="line">But never doubt I love.</div>
                              <div class="line">'O dear Ophelia, I am ill at these numbers;</div>
                              <div class="line">I have not art to reckon my groans: but that</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee best, O most best, believe it. Adieu.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Thine evermore most dear lady, whilst</div>
                              <div class="line">this machine is to him, HAMLET.'</div>
                              <div class="line">This, in obedience, hath my daughter shown me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And more above, hath his solicitings,</div>
                              <div class="line">As they fell out by time, by means and place,</div>
                              <div class="line">All given to mine ear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But how hath she</div>
                              <div class="line">Received his love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What do you think of me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">As of a man faithful and honourable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I would fain prove so. But what might you think,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I had seen this hot love on the wing--</div>
                              <div class="line">As I perceived it, I must tell you that,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before my daughter told me--what might you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or my dear majesty your queen here, think,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I had play'd the desk or table-book,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or given my heart a winking, mute and dumb,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or look'd upon this love with idle sight;</div>
                              <div class="line">What might you think? No, I went round to work,</div>
                              <div class="line">And my young mistress thus I did bespeak:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Lord Hamlet is a prince, out of thy star;</div>
                              <div class="line">This must not be:' and then I precepts gave her,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she should lock herself from his resort,</div>
                              <div class="line">Admit no messengers, receive no tokens.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which done, she took the fruits of my advice;</div>
                              <div class="line">And he, repulsed--a short tale to make--</div>
                              <div class="line">Fell into a sadness, then into a fast,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thence to a watch, thence into a weakness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thence to a lightness, and, by this declension,</div>
                              <div class="line">Into the madness wherein now he raves,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all we mourn for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you think 'tis this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">It may be, very likely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath there been such a time--I'd fain know that--</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have positively said 'Tis so,'</div>
                              <div class="line">When it proved otherwise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not that I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Pointing to his head and shoulder</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">Take this from this, if this be otherwise:</div>
                              <div class="line">If circumstances lead me, I will find</div>
                              <div class="line">Where truth is hid, though it were hid indeed</div>
                              <div class="line">Within the centre.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How may we try it further?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You know, sometimes he walks four hours together</div>
                              <div class="line">Here in the lobby.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">So he does indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">At such a time I'll loose my daughter to him:</div>
                              <div class="line">Be you and I behind an arras then;</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark the encounter: if he love her not</div>
                              <div class="line">And be not from his reason fall'n thereon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me be no assistant for a state,</div>
                              <div class="line">But keep a farm and carters.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING CLAUDIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We will try it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">QUEEN GERTRUDE</div>
                              <div class="line">But, look, where sadly the poor wretch comes reading.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, I do beseech you, both away:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll board him presently.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt KING CLAUDIUS, QUEEN GERTRUDE, and
Attendants</p>
                              <p>Enter HAMLET, reading</p>
                              <div class="line">O, give me leave:</div>
                              <div class="line">How does my good Lord Hamlet?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, God-a-mercy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you know me, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellent well; you are a fishmonger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Then I would you were so honest a man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Honest, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir; to be honest, as this world goes, is to be</div>
                              <div class="line">one man picked out of ten thousand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">That's very true, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">For if the sun breed maggots in a dead dog, being a</div>
                              <div class="line">god kissing carrion,--Have you a daughter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I have, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Let her not walk i' the sun: conception is a</div>
                              <div class="line">blessing: but not as your daughter may conceive.</div>
                              <div class="line">Friend, look to 't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  How say you by that? Still harping on my</div>
                              <div class="line">daughter: yet he knew me not at first; he said I</div>
                              <div class="line">was a fishmonger: he is far gone, far gone: and</div>
                              <div class="line">truly in my youth I suffered much extremity for</div>
                              <div class="line">love; very near this. I'll speak to him again.</div>
                              <div class="line">What do you read, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Words, words, words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Between who?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean, the matter that you read, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Slanders, sir: for the satirical rogue says here</div>
                              <div class="line">that old men have grey beards, that their faces are</div>
                              <div class="line">wrinkled, their eyes purging thick amber and</div>
                              <div class="line">plum-tree gum and that they have a plentiful lack of</div>
                              <div class="line">wit, together with most weak hams: all which, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">though I most powerfully and potently believe, yet</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold it not honesty to have it thus set down, for</div>
                              <div class="line">yourself, sir, should be old as I am, if like a crab</div>
                              <div class="line">you could go backward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Though this be madness, yet there is method</div>
                              <div class="line">in 't. Will you walk out of the air, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Into my grave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, that is out o' the air.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">How pregnant sometimes his replies are! a happiness</div>
                              <div class="line">that often madness hits on, which reason and sanity</div>
                              <div class="line">could not so prosperously be delivered of. I will</div>
                              <div class="line">leave him, and suddenly contrive the means of</div>
                              <div class="line">meeting between him and my daughter.--My honourable</div>
                              <div class="line">lord, I will most humbly take my leave of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">You cannot, sir, take from me any thing that I will</div>
                              <div class="line">more willingly part withal: except my life, except</div>
                              <div class="line">my life, except my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Fare you well, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">These tedious old fools!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ROSENCRANTZ and GUILDENSTERN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LORD POLONIUS</div>
                              <div class="line">You go to seek the Lord Hamlet; there he is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSENCRANTZ</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To POLONIUS</span>  God save you, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit POLONIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GUILDENSTERN</div>
                              <div class="line">My honoured lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSENCRANTZ</div>
                              <div class="line">My most dear lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">My excellent good friends! How dost thou,</div>
                              <div class="line">Guildenstern? Ah, Rosencrantz! Good lads, how do ye both?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSENCRANTZ</div>
                              <div class="line">As the indifferent children of the earth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GUILDENSTERN</div>
                              <div class="line">Happy, in that we are not over-happy;</div>
                              <div class="line">On fortune's cap we are not the very button.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor the soles of her shoe?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSENCRANTZ</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Then you live about her waist, or in the middle of</div>
                              <div class="line">her favours?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GUILDENSTERN</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, her privates we.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">In the secret parts of fortune? O, most true; she</div>
                              <div class="line">is a strumpet. What's the news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSENCRANTZ</div>
                              <div class="line">None, my lord, but that the world's grown honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Then is doomsday near: but your news is not true.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me question more in particular: what have you,</div>
                              <div class="line">my good friends, deserved at the hands of fortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">that she sends you to prison hither?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GUILDENSTERN</div>
                              <div class="line">Prison, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HAMLET</div>
                              <div class="line">Denmark's a prison.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ROSENCRANTZ</div>
                              <div class="line">Then is the world one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
